Test:
----
var_dump(PHPExcel_Cell::coordinateFromString('5'));

----
Throw exception since '5' is not a valid cell coordinate
 
Actual result:
----
array(2) { [0]=>  string(0) "" [1]=>  string(0) "" } 
 
Environment:

WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel_Cell::coordinateFromString should throw exception for bad string parameter
